dcterms:creator: F. Qu
S. Wang
W. Yan
H. Li
S. Wu
X. Fu
dcterms:description: A database for spontaneous macro-expression and micro-expression spotting and recognition, consisting of 98 long videos with an average length of 2940 frames captured at 30 FPS, annotated with 57 micro-expression and 300 macro-expression intervals.
dcterms:title: CAS(ME)2

dcterms:creator: J. Li
Z. Dong
S. Lu
S.-J. Wang
W.-J. Yan
Y. Ma
Y. Liu
C. Huang
X. Fu
dcterms:description: A third generation facial spontaneous micro-expression database with depth information and high ecological validity, consisting of 956 videos with an average length of 2600 frames at 30 FPS, annotated with 207 micro-expressions and 2071 macro-expressions.
dcterms:title: CAS(ME)3

dcterms:creator: C. H. Yap
C. Kendrick
M. H. Yap
dcterms:description: A spontaneous facial micro- and macro-expressions dataset consisting of 224 long videos with an average length of 7000 frames captured at 200 FPS, annotated with 159 micro-expressions and 340 macro-expressions.
dcterms:title: SAMM-LV
